TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program version 1.0 is entering Experimental staging

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

This is a quick but very important update on the development of KSP 1.0: we're currently in the process of wrapping up QA testing and moving to the experimental testing phase! Soon we'll unleash the experimental testers on all the new features, optimisations and bugfixes that the developers have crammed into the next update. We're excited to be moving forward on our development schedule, and we hope you are as well. We'd like to stress that due to the nature of a 1.0 release we've scheduled more time than usual for experimental testing.

If you're interested in how the QA & Experimental process works I can recommend reading [Ted's article](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/303) on the process.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T21:42:13Z" title="04/02/2015 09:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by KasperVld**
